metadata.title: CVE-2024-46708 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: qcom: x1e80100: Fix special pin offsetsRemove the erroneus 0x100000 offset to prevent the boards from crashingon pin state setting, as well as for the intended state changes to takeeffect.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
